Interface ColumnConfiguration

      Calculates the automatic width of columns

      Returns the width of the given column

      Returns the number of columns in the table

      Informs the widget that new Columns have been inserted in the table.

      Move an existing column to a new position

      Informs the widget the Columns have been updated.

      Informs the widget that columns have been removed from the table.

      Sets the width of the given column
      void setFrozenColumns(int nr)
      Freezes the nr first columns so that scrolling does not affect them

      • setColumnWidth

        void setColumnWidth(int columnIndex,
                  double width)
        Sets the width of the given column
        Parameters:

      • getColumnWidth

        double getColumnWidth(int columnIndex)
        Returns the width of the given column
        Parameters:
        columnIndex -
        Returns:
        The width in pixels or -1 if using auto sizing and the column width has not yet been calculated
